official_title: A bill to amend title IV of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to prohibit federally ordered assignment of teachers or students on racial and other similar grounds.

summary.text: Amends title IV of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 (Desegregation of Public Education) to prohibit a Federal court or official from compelling the assignment of teachers or students to schools on the basis of race, religion, sex, or national origin.
